AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Kemel-Ze researcher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was lucky enough to be allowed access to Kemel-Ze, thanks to a rather influential friend. The ruins were a truly marvellous spectacle, [PAWN_nameDef] could spend years in there, and still find new things to study. Of course [PAWN_pronoun] had a habit of getting in the way of the Imperial Archaeological Societies work, not that [PAWN_pronoun] really cared.
